Pre-conditions: User is logged in. Profile exists.

Test Case Description: Verify error on invalid email format
Pre-conditions: User is logged in. Profile exists.
Test Case Procedure: 1. Navigate to Profile page.; 2. Click Edit.; 3. Enter invalid email.; 4. Save.
Test Data: Username: johndoe; Full Name: John Doe; Email: invalidemail; Phone: 123456789; Profile Picture: src/test/resources/image.png
Expected Results: Error message "Invalid email format" is displayed.
